Description:
Urgent Sales Representative (any nationality)Our company based in Dubai UAE urgently looking for Sales Representative as per the below description. Job DescriptionMain responsibilities /duties: Responsible for increasing sales turnover and getting new clients
Handle Sales Enquiries
Prepare and deliver appropriate presentations on products and services    
Coordinate with the production to meet delivery times
Schedule workflow to meet customer move-in date
Build professional sales team & installation team
Have strong verbal and written communication skills ( English and Arabic )
Knows how to use Microsoft office appSkills
Skills:
Having knowledge about the Interior Design company works.
Have Driving License
Knows how to operate auto cad system
Our company offer a good salary based on your experience + bonus + benefits.
